item.description:
After begging, pleading and threats of gratuitous violence, we have great news!

Gas Lamp has agreed to move their trivia events back to a reasonable time! Join us at 8pm for dinner/appetizers/drinks/whatever and some team trivia action. You don't have to be a master of trivia, and we get to huddle (as a team) before turning in any answers, so there is *NO* pressure.

Gas Lamp Grille Features: Great Food, Exotic Beers, Music, sports on their several large-screen plasma televisions, and most importantly, yours truly!

Trivia starts around 9:00 and goes pretty quickly. We'll meet at 8:00 so we have time to chat and taunt the other teams with our patented triple Ts (Trivia Trash-Talking).
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the Bar - Adam is 5'8" with short dark brown hair, cell: (401) 699-7304
item.name: The Gas Lamp Grille - EARLY Monday Trivia
